00008 #include <blond/constants.h>
00009 #include <blond/globals.h>

00011 #include <blond/input_parameters/RfParameters.h>

00014 /*
00015  :How to use RF programs:
00016 
00017  - For 1 RF system and constant values of V, h or phi, just input the single
00018  value
00019  - For 1 RF system and varying values of V, h or phi, input an array of n_turns
00020  values
00021  - For several RF systems and constant values of V, h or phi, input lists of
00022  single values
00023  - For several RF systems and varying values of V, h or phi, input lists of
00024  arrays of n_turns values
00025  */
00026 
00027 RfParameters::RfParameters(uint n_rf, f_vector_2d_t harmonic,
00028                            f_vector_2d_t voltage, f_vector_2d_t phi_offset,
00029                            f_vector_2d_t phi_noise, f_vector_2d_t omega_rf,
00030                            uint section_index,
00031                            accelerating_systems_t accelerating_systems)
00032 {
00033     auto GP = Context::GP;
00034     this->counter = 0;
00035     this->idx = section_index - 1;
00036 
00037     this->n_rf = n_rf;
00038     this->harmonic = harmonic;
00039     this->voltage = voltage;
00040     this->phi_offset = phi_offset;
00041     this->section_length = GP->ring_length[idx];
00042     this->length_ratio = section_length / GP->ring_circumference;
00043     this->phi_noise = phi_noise;
00044 
00045 
00046     // TODO: check with multi Rf
00047     E_increment.resize(GP->n_turns);
00048     for (uint j = 0; j < GP->n_turns; ++j) {
00049         E_increment[j] = energy(j + 1) - energy(j);
00050     }
00051 
00052     phi_s.resize(GP->n_turns + 1);
00053     calc_phi_s(phi_s.data(), this, accelerating_systems);
00054 
00055     this->Qs.resize(GP->n_turns + 1);
00056     for (uint i = 0; i < GP->n_turns + 1; ++i)
00057         Qs[i] = std::sqrt(harmonic[idx][i] * GP->charge * voltage[idx][i] *
00058                           std::fabs(eta_0(i) * cos(phi_s[i])) /
00059                           (2 * constant::pi * beta(i) *
00060                            beta(i) * energy(i)));
00061 
00062     this->omega_s0.resize(GP->n_turns + 1);
00063     for (uint i = 0; i < (GP->n_turns + 1); ++i)
00064         this->omega_s0[i] = Qs[i] * GP->omega_rev[i];
00065 
00066     this->omega_RF_d.resize(n_rf, f_vector_t(GP->n_turns + 1));
00067 
00068     for (uint i = 0; i < n_rf; ++i)
00069         for (uint j = 0; j < GP->n_turns + 1; ++j)
00070             omega_RF_d[i][j] = 2 * constant::pi * beta(j) * constant::c *
00071                                harmonic[i][j] / GP->ring_circumference;
00072 
00073     if (omega_rf.empty()) {
00074         omega_RF = omega_RF_d;
00075     } else {
00076         this->omega_RF = omega_rf;
00077     }
00078 
00079     phi_RF = phi_offset;
00080     this->dphi_RF.resize(n_rf, 0);
00081     this->dphi_RF_steering.resize(n_rf, 0);
00082     t_RF.resize(GP->n_turns + 1);
00083     for (uint i = 0; i < GP->n_turns + 1; ++i)
00084         t_RF[i] = 2 * constant::pi / omega_RF[idx][i];
00085 }

00087 RfParameters::~RfParameters() {}
00088 
00089 ftype RfParameters::eta_tracking(const Beams *beam, const uint counter,
00090                                  const ftype dE)
00091 {
00092     auto GP = Context::GP;
00093 
00094     ftype eta = 0;
00095     if (GP->alpha_order == 1)
00096         eta = eta_0(counter);
00097     else {
00098         ftype delta =
00099             dE / ((GP->beta[0][0]) * (GP->beta[0][0]) * GP->energy[0][0]);
00100         eta += eta_0(counter) * 1;
00101         if (GP->alpha_order > 0)
00102             eta += eta_1(counter) * delta;
00103         if (GP->alpha_order > 1)
00104             eta += eta_2(counter) * delta * delta;
00105         if (GP->alpha_order > 2)
00106             dprintf(
00107                 "WARNING: Momentum compaction factor is implemented only up to "
00108                 "2nd order");
00109     }
00110     return eta;
00111 }

00113 ftype RfParameters::eta_0(const uint i) { return Context::GP->eta_0[idx][i]; }
00114

00119 ftype RfParameters::beta(const uint i) { return Context::GP->beta[idx][i]; }
00120 
00121 ftype RfParameters::gamma(const uint i) { return Context::GP->gamma[idx][i]; }
00122 
00123 ftype RfParameters::energy(const uint i) { return Context::GP->energy[idx][i]; }
00124 
00125 ftype RfParameters::momentum(const uint i) {return Context::GP->momentum[idx][i];}
00126 
00127 int RfParameters::sign_eta_0(const uint i)
00128 {
00129     if (eta_0(i) > 0)
00130         return 1;
00131     else if (eta_0(i) == 0)
00132         return 0;
00133     else
00134         return -1;
00135 }
00136 
00137 void calc_phi_s(ftype *out, RfParameters *rfp,
00138                 RfParameters::accelerating_systems_t acc_sys)
00139 {
00140     /*
00141      | *The synchronous phase calculated from the rate of momentum change.*
00142      | *Below transition, for decelerating bucket: phi_s is in (-Pi/2,0)*
00143      | *Below transition, for accelerating bucket: phi_s is in (0,Pi/2)*
00144      | *Above transition, for accelerating bucket: phi_s is in (Pi/2,Pi)*
00145      | *Above transition, for decelerating bucket: phi_s is in (Pi,3Pi/2)*
00146      | *The synchronous phase is calculated at a certain moment.*
00147      | *Uses beta, energy averaged over the turn.*
00148      */
00149     auto GP = Context::GP;
00150 
00151     auto n_turns = GP->n_turns;
00152     auto n_rf = rfp->n_rf;
00153     // ftype eta0 = rf_params->eta0;
00154     if (acc_sys == RfParameters::accelerating_systems_t::as_single) {
00155 
00156         ftype *denergy = new ftype[n_turns + 1];
00157         for (uint j = 0; j < n_turns; ++j)
00158             denergy[j] = rfp->E_increment[j];
00159         denergy[n_turns] = rfp->E_increment[n_turns - 1];
00160 
00161         ftype *acceleration_ratio = new ftype[n_turns + 1];
00162         for (uint i = 0; i < n_turns + 1; ++i)
00163             acceleration_ratio[i] =
00164                 denergy[i] / (GP->charge * rfp->voltage[rfp->idx][i]);
00165 
00166         for (uint i = 0; i < n_turns + 1; ++i)
00167             if (acceleration_ratio[i] > 1 || acceleration_ratio[i] < -1)
00168                 dprintf("Warning!!! Acceleration is not possible (momentum "
00169                         "increment "
00170                         "is too big or voltage too low) at index %d\n",
00171                         i);
00172 
00173         for (uint i = 0; i < n_turns + 1; ++i)
00174             out[i] = asin(acceleration_ratio[i]);
00175 
00176         // ftype *eta0_middle_points = new ftype[n_turns +1];
00177         for (uint i = 0; i < n_turns; ++i) {
00178             ftype middle = (rfp->eta_0(i) + rfp->eta_0(i + 1)) / 2;
00179             if (middle > 0)
00180                 out[i] = constant::pi - out[i];
00181             else
00182                 out[i] = constant::pi + out[i];
00183         }
00184         if (rfp->eta_0(n_turns) > 0)
00185             out[n_turns] = constant::pi - out[n_turns];
00186         else
00187             out[n_turns] = constant::pi + out[n_turns];
00188 
00189         delete[] denergy;
00190         delete[] acceleration_ratio;
00191 
00192         return;
00193 
00194     } else if (acc_sys == RfParameters::accelerating_systems_t::all) {
00195         /*
00196          In this case, all the RF systems are accelerating, phi_s is
00197          calculated accordingly with respect to the fundamental frequency (the
00198          minimum
00199          of the potential well is taken)
00200          */
00201 
00202         f_vector_t transition_phase_offset(n_turns + 1);
00203         // = new ftype[n_turns + 1];
00204         for (uint i = 0; i < n_turns + 1; ++i) {
00205             out[i] = 0;
00206             if (rfp->eta_0(i) > 0)
00207                 transition_phase_offset[i] = constant::pi;
00208             else
00209                 transition_phase_offset[i] = 0;
00210         }
00211         f_vector_t phase_array(1000);
00212         mymath::linspace(phase_array.data(), -constant::pi * 1.2,
00213                          constant::pi * 1.2, 1000);
00214 
00215         for (uint i = 0; i < n_turns; ++i) {
00216             f_vector_t totalRF(1000, 0); // = { };
00217             for (uint j = 0; j < n_rf; ++j) {
00218                 ftype min = rfp->harmonic[0][i];
00219                 for (uint k = 0; k < n_rf; ++k)
00220                     min = std::min(min, rfp->harmonic[k][i]);
00221                 // ftype min = rfp->harmonic[mymath::min(rfp->harmonic, n_rf,
00222                 // n_turns +
00223                 // 1)];
00224                 for (uint k = 0; k < 1000; ++k) {
00225                     totalRF[k] +=
00226                         rfp->voltage[j][i + 1] *
00227                         std::sin((rfp->harmonic[j][i + 1] / min) *
00228                                  (phase_array[k] +
00229                                   transition_phase_offset[i + 1]) +
00230                                  rfp->phi_offset[j][i + 1]);
00231                 }
00232             }
00233             uint transition_factor = transition_phase_offset[i] == 0 ? +1 : -1;
00234             // dump(totalRF, 10, "totalRF\n");
00235 
00236             ftype potential_well[1000] = {0};
00237             ftype *f = new ftype[1000];
00238             for (uint k = 0; k < 1000; ++k) {
00239                 f[k] = totalRF[k] - rfp->E_increment[i] / GP->charge;
00240             }
00241 
00242             // dump(f, 10, "f\n");
00243 
00244             // dprintf("dx %.12lf\n", phase_array[1] - phase_array[0]);
00245 
00246             auto trap =
00247                 mymath::cum_trapezoid(f, phase_array[1] - phase_array[0], 1000);
00248 
00249             for (uint k = 0; k < 1000; ++k) {
00250                 potential_well[k] = transition_factor * trap[k];
00251             }
00252             // dump(potential_well, 10, "potential_well\n");
00253 
00254             // TODO why mean here? line BLonD-minimal::rf_parameter.py:334
00255             out[i + 1] = phase_array[mymath::min(potential_well, 1000, 1)] +
00256                          transition_phase_offset[i + 1];
00257         }
00258         // delete[] transition_phase_offset;
00259         out[0] = out[1];
00260         // dump(out, 10, "out\n");
00261 
00262         return;
00263 
00264     } else if (acc_sys == RfParameters::accelerating_systems_t::first) {
00265         /*
00266          Only the first RF system is accelerating, so we have to correct the
00267          phi_offset of the other rf_systems such that p_increment relates
00268          only to the first RF
00269          */
00270         ;
00271     } else {
00272         dprintf(
00273             "Did not recognize the option accelerating_systems in calc_phi_s "
00274             "function\n");
00275         exit(-1);
00276     }
00277 
00278     // TODO, how can we get here?
00279     // TODO why n_turns and not n_turns+1?
00280 
00281     if (rfp->eta_0(0) > 0) {
00282         for (uint i = 0; i < n_turns; ++i)
00283             out[i] = constant::pi;
00284     } else {
00285         for (uint i = 0; i < n_turns; ++i)
00286             out[i] = 0;
00287     }
00288 }
